questions.question: Confirm the equipment with provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident/Damage and Missing report.
Connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another place where the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and also check whether 19VDC & 5VDC voltage are available

videos.videoName: Video for checking power adaptor voltage

questions.question: replace the power adapter with a new one
check and confirm whether the switch illuminates after switching ON
replace the switch with a new one
check and confirm for any breakage or damage of power pin connector
replace the power pin connector with a new one
check and confirm whether the input and output voltages of DC-DC Board are available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking voltages of DC-DC Board

questions.question: repair / replace the DC-DC Convertor board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the DC-DC Board

questions.question: check for loose connections or breakage of cables from DC-DC Board to Control Board.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Control Board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display blank/plane
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cables to Backlight board
reseat or replaces the cables accordingly
repair / replace the Backlight board accordingly and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Backlight Board

questions.question: repair /replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Control Board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the probe not detected message appears on the display
check for damage / breakage probe pin connector
replace the probe with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair / replace the probe module accordingly
check and confirm whether the cursor is not working
remove the cursor carefully as shown and clean it with the soft cloth
the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
